47.ara-name: كتاب تفسير القرآن عن رسول الله صلى الله عليه وسلم

hadiths.text: Narrated Musa bin Talhah:"I entered upon Mu'awiyah and he said:' Shall I not give you some good news?' I said: 'Of course!' He said: 'I heard the Messenger of Allah (ﷺ) saying: 'Talhah is among those who fulfilled their vow
